data.title: Rent This Darling Laurel Canyon Retreat From Actress-Singer Aly Michalka for $7.5K a Month
data.meta_description: Owning this homey hideaway, with its gorgeous views and open layout, would be like having your very own mountain retreat.
data.text:
Aly Michalka, actress and half of pop duo Aly & AJ, is looking for a tenant to rent her adorable post-and-beam Laurel Canyon, CA, property.

She’s asking $7,500 per month for the two-bedroom, one-bathroom spot situated in the Hollywood Hills.

Built in 1956, the homey hideaway has 1,238 square feet spread across an airy, open-concept floor plan.

Enter through the bright orange door and into the artistic abode that brims with character. In the living room area, there are multiple skylights, a sleek fireplace, and light hardwood floors.

The space includes a dining nook and an office area.

A wall of windows opens to the backyard, which boasts a multilevel patio, an alfresco dining room, and many miles worth of gorgeous views.

A cook’s kitchen

Steps away from the living room is a well-appointed kitchen. Stainless steel appliances, wood cabinets, and white-tiled walls are among the details that comprise a perfect space for plenty of culinary adventures.

California dreaming

After a long day, retire to the picture-perfect primary suite. The romantic sleep quarters consist of clerestory windows, gray-toned wood floors, and an oversized soaking tub. Meanwhile, a double-hung door offers backyard access from this bedroom.

The second bedroom, with built-in shelving and sliding-glass closet doors, can pull double duty if an office if needed.

What’s more, the home’s recently updated bathroom features high-end details, including a glass shower and tiled walls.

The home also has covered parking, central heat and air, and a tankless water heater.

Michalka, 34, rose to fame after starring on the Disney Channel hit show, “Phil of the Future,” and has appeared in movies such as “Easy A.”
